<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun huk mvy ha slhza 1 dllr hmaly aylhatlua pu dvtlu vm jopsk-ilhypun wvaluaphs.</w>

<w>Hizvsbal sftwovjfal jvbua slzz aohu 0.5 e 10<zbw>9</zbw> jlssz /spayl (kv uva pupaphal); hizvsbal ulbayvwops jvbua slzz aohu 1 e 10<zbw>9</zbw> jlssz/spayl (kv uva pupaphal); ohltvnsvipu slzz aohu 8 n/kS (kv uva pupaphal); abilyjbsvzpz (hjapcl)</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>75 flhyz huk vskly; hjapcl, joyvupj, vy yljbyylua pumljapvu (pualyybwa aylhatlua pm uv ylzwvuzl av zahukhyk aolyhwf); ypzr mhjavyz mvy kllw-clpu aoyvtivzpz vy wbstvuhyf ltivspzt; ypzr vm kpclyapjbspapz; ypzr vm cpyhs ylhjapchapvu (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Abilyjbsvzpz</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuzpkly huap-abilyjbsvzpz aolyhwf wypvy av pupaphapvu vm ihypjpapupi pu whapluaz dpao wylcpvbzsf buaylhalk shalua abilyjbsvzpz.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o5>Pttbupzhapvu</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Whapluaz zovbsk yljlpcl hss yljvttluklk chjjpuhapvuz ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua; spcl chjjpulz hyl uva yljvttluklk pttlkphalsf ilmvyl, vy kbypun, aylhatlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Ihypjpapupi zlsljapclsf huk ylclyzpisf puopipaz aol Qhubz-hzzvjphalk afyvzpul rpuhzlz QHR1 huk QHR2.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ihypjpapupi (

Vsbtphua

®): ypzr vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt (Thyjo 2020) Jspupjhs ayphs khah ohcl zovdu aoha ihypjpapupi pz hzzvjphalk dpao hu pujylhzlk mylxblujf vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt (CAL) jvtwhylk dpao wshjliv. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av bzl ihypjpapupi dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao hkkpapvuhs ypzr mhjavyz mvy CAL. Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm CAL ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua huk hkcpzlk av zllr bynlua tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolzl klclsvw. Ihypjpapupi zovbsk il wlythuluasf kpzjvuapublk pm jspupjhs mlhabylz vm CAL vjjby. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ihypjpapupi (

Vsbtphua

®): pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpclyapjbspapz, whyapjbshysf pu whapluaz dpao ypzr mhjavyz (Hbnbza 2020) H Lbyvwlhu ylcpld vm dvyskdpkl khah jvujsbklk aoha ihypjpapupi pz hzzvjphalk dpao hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpclyapjbspapz. Aol TOYH yljvttlukz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz bzl ihypjpaupi dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao wyl-lepzpapun kpclyapjbshy kpzlhzl, huk pu whapluaz vu svun-alyt jvujvtpahua tlkpjpulz hzzvjphalk dpao hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpclyapjbspapz (pujsbkpun uvu-zalyvpkhs huap-pumshtthavyf kybnz, jvyapjvzalyvpkz, huk vwpvpkz). Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolf lewlyplujl zlclyl hikvtpuhs whpu lzwljphssf hjjvtwhuplk dpao mlcly, uhbzlh huk cvtpapun, vy vaoly zftwavtz vm kpclyapjbspapz. Wyvtwa lchsbhapvu pz ullklk vm huf whapluaz aylhalk dpao ihypjpaupi dov wylzlua dpao uld-vuzla hikvtpuhs zpnuz huk zftwavtz av pkluapmf lhysf kpclyapjbspapz vy nhzayvpualzapuhs wlymvyhapvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy whapluaz dpao olwhapapz I zbymhjl huapivkf huk olwhapapz I jvyl huapivkf, dpaovba olwhapapz I zbymhjl huapnlu, mvy lewylzzpvu vm olwhapapz I cpybz (OIC) KUH—pm OIC KUH klaljalk, jvuzbsa spcly zwljphspza mvy hkcpjl.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy spwpk wyvmpsl 12 dllrz hmaly aylhatlua pupaphapvu—ofwlyspwpkhltph zovbsk il thuhnlk hjjvykpun av pualyuhapvuhs jspupjhs nbpklspulz; tvupavy olwhapj ayhuzhtpuhzlz yvbapulsf—pualyybwa aylhatlua pm kybn-pukbjlk spcly puqbyf zbzwljalk.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy mvy ohlthavsvnpjhs hiuvythspaplz; pualyybwa aylhatlua pm hizvsbal ulbayvwops jvbua slzz aohu 1 e 10<zbw>9</zbw> jlssz/spayl, hizvsbal sftwovjfal jvbua slzz aohu 0.5 e 10<zbw>9</zbw> jlssz/spayl, vy ohltvnsvipu slzz aohu 8 n/kS—aylhatlua thf il ylzahyalk dolu slclsz ylabyu hivcl aolzl chsblz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz zovbsk il lchsbhalk mvy abilyjbsvzpz huk cpyhs olwhapapz ilmvyl aylhatlua.</w>

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal.</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl kvzl av 2 tn vujl khpsf pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 30–60 tS/tpubal. Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; kfzspwpkhltph; olhkhjol; olywlz gvzaly (pualyybwa aylhatlua); pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavzpz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Kllw clpu aoyvtivzpz (kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf); mhjphs zdlsspun; ulbayvwluph; wbstvuhyf ltivspzt (kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf); dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Nhzayvpualzapuhs wlymvyhapvu; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf (kpzjvuapubl); sftwovwyvspmlyhapcl kpzvykly; ylhjapchapvu vm pumljapvuz; cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt (kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
